name: I am Karan Singh
body:
### About Me
I am Karan. I am a senior undergrad at IIT Kanpur, where my major is computer science. While I am a theorist at heart, I enjoy reading on a broad spectrum of topics -- programming languages, linguistics, economics, design, machine learning, tech know-how. I spend the better half of my time thinking and learning about learning theory, statistics, optimization, and theoretical computer science. The intersection of all these subjects lead to some very interesting problems (and theory) that intrigues me.

Some of the stuff that might be interesting --
* [Critique](http://i-am-karan-singh.github.io/Critique/) (Super short) book and reviews and paper summaries
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
